title: Awarding the contract for Ground Handling Services for SriLankan Airlines
decision_details:
- Limited International Competitive Bids have been invited for ground handling services for SriLankan Airlines at Delhi and Trichy International Airports in India, Beijing International Airport in China and Kuwait International Airport. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. Minister of Ports, Shipping and Aviation to award the relevant procurements respectively to the following bidders as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.

*	Celebi Airport Services India Pvt. Ltd.

*	Bird Airport Services (Trichy) Pvt. Ltd.

*	Beijing Aviation Ground Services Company Limited 

*	National Aviation Services W.L.L.
